item.title: Israeli hospital hit by Iranian missile strike
item.description: Israel called the attack "criminal", while Iran said it had targeted a site nearby and not the hospital itself.

item.title: Police ban Budapest Pride march, but mayor vows it will go ahead
item.description: It's the latest twist in a cat-and-mouse confrontation between the government and Hungary's LGBTQ community.

item.title: 'I was lying in bed... The ceiling fell in': At the scene of Israeli hospital hit by Iran strike
item.description: A hospital in the Israeli town of Beersheba was hit as Iran fired a barrage of missiles at the country.

item.title: At least 12 Palestinians killed waiting for aid in Gaza, say medics
item.description: It is the latest in almost daily shootings near aid sites in Gaza, which have left hundreds dead overall.

item.title: 'Life-threatening storm surge' warning as Hurricane Erick hits Mexico's Oaxaca
item.description: The storm is expected to bring 'devastating winds' to the states of Oaxaca and Guerrero.
